programme.desc: אנימציה מדובבת לעברית. סיפור המערב הפרוע דרך עיניו של סוס המשוטט ברחבי אמריקה הלא מיושבת. במסעו הוא פוגש את האדם בפעם הראשונה, מגלה טיבה של חברות ומתאהב בסוסה יפהפיה. במאים: קלי אסברי, לורנה קוק. ארה"ב, 2002.

programme.title: צוות ג'ונגל מטריפים ת'עולם (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. הגיבורים האהובים (והמטורללים) של הג'ונגל חוזרים! קצף ורוד ומוזר מתפשט על פני הג'ונגל ויוצר פיצוצים במגע עם מים. החבורה יוצאת למסע חוצה גלובוס כדי להציל את הג'ונגל, לפני שעונת הגשמים תתחיל. דיבוב עב'. 2023.

programme.title: מבצע קוקוריקו (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. כשאספן ביצים חמדן חוטף את ביצי התרנגולים, אולי ומקס, ולוקח אותם לאפריקה כדי להפוך אותם לארוחה, ההורים המודאגים שלהם טסים לקצה השני של העולם לפני שיהיה מאוחר מדי. דיבוב: דן קיזלר, נועה לפידות. 2021. כ' עב'.

programme.title: בלאגן על ארבע (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה. כלבלב מפונק מוצא עצמו ברחוב לאחר שנמלט מהילדים החמדנים של בעליו הקודמים. כעת כשהוא מנסה לשרוד בעולם האמיתי, באים לעזרתו כלב רחוב קשוח ומוזיקאית צעירה. דיבוב: דן קיזלר, דקלה הדר. במאי: קווין ג'ונסון. 2019.

programme.title: בלש על שמונה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. המפקח סאן הוא בלש-עכביש אשר פותר תעלומות בלתי פתורות בעולם החרקים. כשהוא עולה על מטוס לחופשה, הוא מגלה כי בטיסה מתבצע פשע בעל השלכות לא רק על עולם החרקים, אלא גם על בני האדם. דיבוב עב': גדי לוי. 2022.

programme.title: מרמדיוק (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית אנימציה לכל המשפחה. מרמדיוק הוא כלב דני ענק, נאמן ובעל נטייה להסתבך בצרות. לאחר שסרטון בו הוא מצולם הופך לויראלי, מאלף כלבים מפורסם מחליט לקחת את האתגר ולאמן אותו עד אליפות העולם לכלבים! דיבוב עב': עמית יוסוביץ'. 2022.

programme.title: ריקי הקרנף בממלכת הג'ונגל (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. ריקי הקרנף הצעיר וחברו הטוב, בני הברווז העליז והאופטימי, יוצאים למסע ברחבי ג'ונגלים טרופיים כדי למצוא את זרע הקסם שיציל את ביתם מצונאמי צפוי. דיבוב: יולי סקר, דן שצברג. במאי: ארווין בודיונו. 2024.

programme.title: קונג פו פנדה 4 (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרביעי בסדרת סרטי האנימציה המצליחה. לאחר שלוש הרפתקאות מסכנות חיים, נקרא לוחם הדרקון "פו" לגמלאות. על הדרך הוא צריך למצוא לוחם דרקון שיתפוס את מקומו, ואין לו רגע לבזבז... דיבוב:דביר בנדק. במאי:מייק מיטשל. 2024. כ' עב'.

programme.title: הצילו! כיווצתי את ההורים (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית הרפתקאות. רוחה של מנהלת מרשעת מטילה כישוף על בית הספר והופכת את כולם לזעירים. כעת על פליקס, שהוריו כווצו, וחברתו הטובה אלה לנסות ולהציל את המצב לפני שיהיה מאוחר מידי. דיבוב עברית: ניר פרץ. גרמניה, 2018. כ' עב'.

programme.title: סוניק - הסרט 2
programme.desc: הקיפוד האהוב והמהיר בעולם חוזר להרפתקה משודרגת! סוניק נאלץ להתמודד מול נאקלס, אויב עוצמתי מהכוכב שלו, שעוזר לד"ר רובוטניק הרשע להשיג אבן איזמרגד משמידת עולמות. עם: ג'ים קארי, ג'יימס מרסדן. במאי: ג'ף פאולר. ארה"ב, 2022.

programme.title: חתול במוזיאון (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. חתול טוב לב ועכבר חובב אומנות מגיעים למוזיאון מפורסם, שם הם חוברים לחבורת חתולים השומרת על אוצרות המוזיאון. כשציור המונה ליזה נגנב, החברות האמיצה בין השניים מצילה את המצב. דיבוב: ספיר דרמון. 2023. כ' עב'.

programme.title: הפינגווינים ממדגסקר (מדובב)
programme.desc: חברים מדובבים: סרטים בשפה שלנו. הפינגווינים המשעשעים מסרטי "מדגסקר" מככבים בסרט משלהם. הפעם הם משתפים פעולה עם ארגון ריגול מיוחד, במאבק מול תמנון ערמומי. דיבוב עברית: מיכאל הנגבי. 2014. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מרוץ החיות הגדול (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקה במהירות גבוהה. קופיף איטי שאוהב לקחת את הזמן, מחליט להירשם לתחרות של מירוץ מכוניות. מטרתו היא לזכות בפרס הראשון, כך יוכל להציל את ביתה של סבתו שנמצא בסכנה. קולות: קובי ליקורמן, ספיר דרמון. במאי: רוס ונוקור, 2023.

programme.title: מלכת השלג והנסיכה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות נפלאה. בתה של מלכת השלג משחררת בטעות את רוחות הקרח שמקפיאות את העיירה. כדי לתקן את המצב עליה לצאת למסע מסוכן מלא אומץ וקסם. דיבוב: דניאל מגון, אלונה אלכסנדר. רוסיה, 2022. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מרמדיוק (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית אנימציה לכל המשפחה. מרמדיוק הוא כלב דני ענק, נאמן ובעל נטייה להסתבך בצרות. לאחר שסרטון בו הוא מצולם הופך לויראלי, מאלף כלבים מפורסם מחליט לקחת את האתגר ולאמן אותו עד אליפות העולם לכלבים! דיבוב עב': עמית יוסוביץ'. 2022.

programme.title: גנוב על המיניונים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סרט ההמשך ל"גנוב על הירח". גרו מגויס הפעם לליגת האנטי-רשעים כדי להתמודד עם אויב חדש, ויוצא בעקבותיו יחד עם המיניונים המצחיקים והסוכנת לוסי. דיבוב עב': אוהד שחר, ליאת הר-לב. במאים: פייר קופין, כריס רניוד. 2013.

programme.title: קונג פו פנדה 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: קונג פו פנדה חוזר להרפתקה חדשה. הפעם פו מצטרף לקבוצה חדשה של לוחמי קונג-פו כדי לחסל אויב ותיק עם נשק קטלני, כשבמקביל עליו להתמודד עם סודות הקשורים למשפחתו. דיבוב: דביר בנדק, דידי הררי. 2011. כ' עב'.

programme.title: שרק (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה זוכת פרס אוסקר. מפלצת ירוקה ורגזנית, חמור פטפטן ונסיכה יפהפייה יוצאים לעזור לגיבורי האגדות, שסולקו מאדמתם ע"י שליט רשע. במאים: אנדרו אדמסון, ויקי ג'ונסון. ארה"ב, 2001. כ' עב'.

programme.title: רובין וילדי היער
programme.desc: הרפתקאה משוגעת לכל המשפחה. רובין וחבריה אוהבים לשחק במשחקי דמיון ביער שליד ביתם. כשיזמית נדל"ן מרושעת מתכננת להרוס את היער ולבנות במקומו בניינים, החבורה יעשו הכול כדי לשמור על הטבע. במאי: פיל הוקינס. אנגליה, 2024.

programme.title: הצילו! כיווצתי את ההורים (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית הרפתקאות. רוחה של מנהלת מרשעת מטילה כישוף על בית הספר והופכת את כולם לזעירים. כעת על פליקס, שהוריו כווצו, וחברתו הטובה אלה לנסות ולהציל את המצב לפני שיהיה מאוחר מידי. דיבוב עברית: ניר פרץ. גרמניה, 2018. כ' עב'.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.(n)

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.(n)

programme.title: אגדת שלג (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. בצפון הרחוק, במרחבי השלג האין סופיים, נמצא שבט אחד העומד בפני סכנת רעב. שלושה אסקימואים צעירים יוצאים למסע הרפתקאות בעקבות האגדה של סרילה, על-פיה קיימת ארץ מובטחת שתציל את כולם. במאית: ננסי פלורנס. 2013. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: מרוץ החיות הגדול (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקה במהירות גבוהה. קופיף איטי שאוהב לקחת את הזמן, מחליט להירשם לתחרות של מירוץ מכוניות. מטרתו היא לזכות בפרס הראשון, כך יוכל להציל את ביתה של סבתו שנמצא בסכנה. קולות: קובי ליקורמן, ספיר דרמון. במאי: רוס ונוקור, 2023.(n)

programme.title: הפינגווינים ממדגסקר (מדובב)
programme.desc: חברים מדובבים: סרטים בשפה שלנו. הפינגווינים המשעשעים מסרטי "מדגסקר" מככבים בסרט משלהם. הפעם הם משתפים פעולה עם ארגון ריגול מיוחד, במאבק מול תמנון ערמומי. דיבוב עברית: מיכאל הנגבי. 2014. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: לעוף על הזמן (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית אנימציה. שני תרנגולי הודו יריבים יוצאים יחד למסע בזמן כדי לשנות את מהלך ההיסטוריה. דיבוב עברית: אלי פיניש, מריאנו אידלמן. במאי: ג'ימי הייווארד. ארה"ב, 2013. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: ארתור 3: מלחמת שני העולמות (מדובב)
programme.desc: חברים מדובבים: סרטים בשפה שלנו. החלק ה-3 בטרילוגיית "ארתור והמינימונים". מלתזר לוכד את ארתור, וזומם להשתלט על עולם בני האדם. ארתור וחבריו יוצאים למסע הרפתקני במטרה לעצור אותו. קולות: פרדי היימור, מיה פארו. 2010. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: רוז הרובוטית (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקה מופלאה מהיוצרים של "הדרקון הראשון שלי" מועמדת לפרס אוסקר. רוז הרובוטית מוצאת עצמה על אי בודד כשמסביבה מאות בעלי חיים מבוהלים. לאט לאט היא לומדת לתקשר עם הסביבה ובמיוחד עם גוזל אווז מתוק. דיבוב עב': נועה לפידות. 2024.(n)

programme.title: מלכת השלג והנסיכה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות נפלאה. בתה של מלכת השלג משחררת בטעות את רוחות הקרח שמקפיאות את העיירה. כדי לתקן את המצב עליה לצאת למסע מסוכן מלא אומץ וקסם. דיבוב: דניאל מגון, אלונה אלכסנדר. רוסיה, 2022. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: החתול של שרק (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. החתול במגפיים יוצא לעצור פושעים אכזריים שמנסים להשמיד את העולם. אליו מצטרפים חבריו האמיצים כדי לעצור את הרעים בהרפתקה סוחפת ומצחיקה. דיבוב עב': דרור קרן. במאי: כריס מילר. 2011. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: טרולים (מדובב)
programme.desc: על מנת להציל את חבריה מהברגנים, יוצאת פופי מנהיגת הטרולים האופטימית עם בראנץ' הטרול הנרגן, להרפתקה בעולמות רחוקים. דיבוב: לירון לב, נועה קירל. בימוי: וולט דורן, מייק מיטשל. 2016. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: שיר הים
programme.desc: סרט אנימציה יפהפייה, שהיה מועמד לאוסקר. סירשה בת השש היא נצר ליצורים מופלאים. כשסבתה לוקחת אותה ואת אחיה הגדול לעיר, הם בורחים ויוצאים להרפתקאה להציל את עולם הפיות והיצורים הקסומים. עם: ברנדן גליסון. במאי: טום מור, 2014.(n)

programme.title: סוניק הסרט 3
programme.desc: סוניק הקיפוד האהוב והמהיר בעולם חוזר להרפתקה מרהיבה חדשה! סוניק, נאקלס וטיילס מתאחדים נגד יריב חדש ועוצמתי בשם שאדו, בעל כוחות חדשים ומיסתוריים שלא נראו כמותם עד כה. עם: ג'ים קארי, קיאנו ריבס. במאי: ג'ף פאולר. 2024.(n)

programme.title: ג'ננה בסוואנה
programme.desc: אנימציה. חיות הג'ונגל בסוואנה האפריקאית מצפות בשקיקה להצפה השנתית של הנהר, שלצערן מתעכבת. בילי הנמייה האמיצה וסוקרטס האריה הפחדן חוברים לחיות נוספות, כדי לגלות מה מקור הבעיה. במאים: ריינהרד קלוס, הולגר טאפה. 2010.(n)

programme.title: שטוטגרט - מכבי ת''א

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
Fantastic Beasts And Where To Find Them
Fantastic Beasts And Where To Find Them
Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: A teenager strives to be a good daughter, a good friend and a good student - all while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts that she cannot control. When she reconnects with her childhood crush, she is confronted with fundamental questions about her potential for love, happiness, friendship and hope - all while trying to solve a mystery surrounding a fugitive billionaire. Romantic drama, starring Isabela Merced, Cree and Judy Reyes.(n)

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: A singing and dancing war widow tries to shield her son from her husband's interfering wealthy parents by absconding to New York, where she is reunited with her former showbiz partner. They resurrect their old dance act, while her in-laws begin a campaign to claim custody of their grandchild. Musical, starring Fred Astaire, Betty Hutton, Roland Young and Ruth Warrick.(n)

programme.title: Rent
programme.desc: Musical set in 1980s New York, following a year in the life of young artists living in the East Village. A would-be film-maker pines for his lost love and an HIV-positive musician tries to recover from his drug addiction, while their landlord abandons his bohemian ways for the pursuit of wealth. Rosario Dawson stars alongside members of the original Broadway cast, including Taye Diggs, Anthony Rapp and Adam Pascal.(n)

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: Misfit high-school girl Andie Walsh unexpectedly attracts the attentions of a rich, popular boy, but the course of true love runs far from smoothly when their two worlds collide. Romantic drama, starring Molly Ringwald, Andrew McCarthy, James Spader, Jon Cryer and Harry Dean Stanton.(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: A single mother desperate for work pleads her way into a routine administrative job at a law firm. It is not long before she stumbles across mislaid documents about a case brought against a corporation for poisoning the residents of a small town by contaminating their water supply. Realising something is amiss, she begins her own investigation. Fact-based drama, with Julia Roberts in an Oscar-winning role, alongside Albert Finney and Aaron Eckhart.(n)

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with HIV and given 30 days to live discovers that many treatments for his condition are not available in the US. With the aid of a transsexual Aids patient, he sets up a scheme to smuggle the drugs into the country and distribute them to those in need. Fact-based drama, starring Oscar winners Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto, with Jennifer Garner and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jackson's alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott.(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.(n)

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.(n)

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney.(n)

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.(n)

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: Two brothers try to escape their circumstances by travelling across America for a no-holds-barred boxing match that becomes a fight for their lives. Director Max Winkler's drama, starring Charlie Hunnam, Jack O'Connell and Jonathan Majors.(n)

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jackson's alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott.(n)

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.(n)

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: An idle womaniser pretends to be a father to meet women in a single mothers' group - but he starts to change his selfish ways when a lonely youngster with a depressed mum becomes emotionally attached to him. Romantic comedy adapted from Nick Hornby's novel, starring Hugh Grant, Toni Collette, Nicholas Hoult and Rachel Weisz.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Anora
programme.desc: A sex worker marries the son of an oligarch, but his family in Russia try to get the marriage annulled. Writer/director Sean Baker's Oscar-winning romantic comedy, starring Mikey Madison, Paul Weissman and Lindsey Normington.(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: A former professional basketball player agrees to coach a high-school team, but he is unimpressed by its lack of discipline and instigates a tough new regimen. All goes well until the youngsters start to become complacent, forcing him to take drastic action - which leads to a backlash of complaints from angry parents and pupils alike. Drama, with Samuel L Jackson, Ashanti, Rob Brown and Robert Ri'chard.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: American zoologist Dian Fossey gives up her comfortable city life to research endangered mountain gorillas in Rwanda. Living among the apes, she develops a close bond with the animals and becomes an expert in how they communicate, while dedicating the rest of her life to protecting gorillas from extinction. Fact-based drama, starring Sigourney Weaver, Bryan Brown, Julie Harris and Iain Cuthbertson.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: An idealistic sports agent produces a mission statement at work promising to treat clients fairly. Unfortunately, it costs him his job. Forced to set up an agency on his own, the only people prepared to stand by him are a lovelorn staff accountant and a footballer. Cameron Crowe's romantic comedy drama, with Tom Cruise, Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Jonathan Lipnicki, and Cuba Gooding Jr, who won an Oscar for his performance.

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: An idle womaniser pretends to be a father to meet women in a single mothers' group - but he starts to change his selfish ways when a lonely youngster with a depressed mum becomes emotionally attached to him. Romantic comedy adapted from Nick Hornby's novel, starring Hugh Grant, Toni Collette, Nicholas Hoult and Rachel Weisz.

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: May 1940. As the Nazis advance against Britain's European allies, newly elected prime minister Winston Churchill must decide whether to leave neighbouring countries to their fate, by striking a peace deal with Hitler, or fight on against terrifying odds for the greater good. Double Oscar and Bafta-winning period drama, starring Gary Oldman, Lily James and Kristin Scott Thomas.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A faded film star from the silent-movie era is fixated with making a comeback. When she meets a struggling screenwriter on the run from debt collectors, she persuades him to write a script that will mark her spectacular return to the screen. However, he takes advantage of the deluded actress, becoming her lover in a relationship where their mutual deceit ends in tragedy. Drama, with Gloria Swanson, William Holden and Eric von Stroheim.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney.

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A hardened gambler is forced to repay a debt to a friend by reluctantly coaching a baseball team of underprivileged youngsters from one of Chicago's toughest neighbourhoods. Along the way, however, he discovers an entirely new perspective on life. Sporting drama, starring Keanu Reeves, Diane Lane, John Hawkes and DB Sweeney.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: May 1940. As the Nazis advance against Britain's European allies, newly elected prime minister Winston Churchill must decide whether to leave neighbouring countries to their fate, by striking a peace deal with Hitler, or fight on against terrifying odds for the greater good. Double Oscar and Bafta-winning period drama, starring Gary Oldman, Lily James and Kristin Scott Thomas.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbet's drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era conman meets a canny nine-year-old orphan, whom he realises could be his daughter, and agrees to take her to her aunt. Along the way, he discovers the little girl is just as cunning as he is, and they form a successful criminal partnership. Drama, starring Ryan O'Neal alongside real-life daughter Tatum. With Madeline Kahn, John Hillerman and Randy Quaid.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: An ageing gunfighter is drawn into the conflict between a land-grabbing cattle baron and a ranching family, but gets wounded in the process. A year later, he returns to town to find the situation has not improved - so along with his sidekick and the drunken town sheriff, he fights to defend the family from its enemies. Western, starring John Wayne, Robert Mitchum, James Caan and Ed Asner.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: The ruthless captain of a US destroyer develops an obsession with tracking down a Russian submarine. As he drives his men harder, he fails to anticipate the consequences of his actions - leading to a fatal mistake. Cold War thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Sidney Poitier, Martin Balsam, Wally Cox, Eric Portman and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: The Damned United
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling Brian Clough's ill-fated 44-day tenure as boss of Leeds United in 1974, after Don Revie's departure for the job of England's manager. Following his acrimonious split from Derby County and a brief spell at Brighton \u0026 Hove Albion, Clough arrived at Elland Road on a wave of controversy, after previously being an outspoken critic of the club, and struggled to find allies among the playing staff. With Michael Sheen, Timothy Spall, Jim Broadbent and Colm Meaney.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. Biopic, starring Helen Mirren, Zed Josef and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: In 1971, an American military analyst uncovers the depths of the US government's deceptions about the futility of the Vietnam War, and takes action by copying top-secret documents that would become the Pentagon Papers. Washington Post owner Kay Graham and her editor Ben Bradlee discover The New York Times is preparing an explosive expose on those papers and, determined to compete, set out to publish them first. Steven Spielberg's fact-based drama, starring Meryl Streep, Tom Hanks, Sarah Paulson and Bob Odenkirk.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Anthology of stories charting the romantic complications of various Los Angeles residents. A businessman and a soldier on leave share a flight home, a teacher is smitten with a doctor and an elderly couple comfort their lovesick grandson. Romantic comedy drama, with Ashton Kutcher, Jessica Alba, Jamie Foxx, Jennifer Garner and Julia Roberts.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: Two brothers try to escape their circumstances by travelling across America for a no-holds-barred boxing match that becomes a fight for their lives. Director Max Winkler's drama, starring Charlie Hunnam, Jack O'Connell and Jonathan Majors.

programme.title: Mother!
programme.desc: A secluded couple's relationship is tested when a surgeon and his lewd wife make an unexpected appearance at their remote home, disrupting their peaceful existence. Thriller, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Javier Bardem, Ed Harris and Michelle Pfeiffer.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess prodigy Bobby Fischer challenges the best player in the Soviet Union in a top championship, causing the two nations to use the event to fuel their respective agendas. Fischer soon finds himself caught between the two superpowers as well as having to deal with his own struggles. Tobey Maguire and Liev Schreiber star in this fact-based sporting drama set in 1972 during the Cold War.(n)

programme.title: Carmen
programme.desc: In Mexico, a young woman flees to the US after her flamenco dancer mother is killed by drug cartel thugs. She crosses paths with Aidan, an ex-marine, and together they go on the run. Director Benjamin Millepied's musical reimagining of Georges Bizet's opera, starring Melissa Barrera and Paul Mescal.(n)

programme.title: L'immensità
programme.desc: In 1970s Rome, a mother contends with her loveless and abusive marriage while caring for her children, one of who is experiencing gender dysphoria and wishes to identify as a boy. Family drama, starring Penélope Cruz, Vincenzo Amato and Luana Giuliani. In Italian.(n)

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his father's shadowed past and his own promising future. Raised by his devoted mother, Rob Peace risks everything he has worked for to free his imprisoned dad. Drama, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, who also adapted Jeff Hobbs' book and directed, with Jay Will, Camila Cabello and Mary J Blige.(n)

programme.title: A Mistake
programme.desc: A talented surgeon's life unravels after an inexperienced colleague makes a fatal mistake. Medical drama, starring Elizabeth Banks, Simon McBurney and Joel Tolbeck.(n)

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: Returning home for his mother's funeral, Renn Wheeland forges new relationships and heals old ones as he faces his grief. Drama, starring Nick Jonas, David Arquette and Brittany Snow.(n)

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game for a decade before being arrested in the middle of the night by FBI agents wielding automatic weapons. Her players included Hollywood royalty, sports stars, business titans and finally - unbeknownst to her - the Russian Mob. Directed by The West Wing creator Aaron Sorkin, and starring Jessica Chastain, Idris Elba and Kevin Costner.(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.(n)

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestro's music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent. As jealousy consumes him, he plots his rival's downfall. Period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A naive young literature student's life is thrown into turmoil by an affair with a mysterious billionaire. Initially she is intrigued by his aloof and distant manner, but soon realises he is harbouring dark secrets and desires. Erotic drama based on EL James' bestseller, starring Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: The bookish Anastasia Steele and damaged billionaire playboy Christian Grey continue their sadomasochistic relationship, while their safety is threatened by strangers from his past. While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her. Erotic drama sequel to Fifty Shades of Grey, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Eric Johnson, Bella Heathcote and Rita Ora.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: As tycoon Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia revel in a life of luxury, their happiness is endangered by her former boss. Conclusion of the romantic thriller trilogy based on EL James' novel, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan and Eric Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscaster's life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boy's hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt and Tamera Mowry-Housley.(n)

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite for Christmas in the French Alps, reminiscing their grandfather's first trip. They cherish sisterhood and romance with their guide, Frederic. Romantic comedy drama, starring Ashley Williams and Laci J Mailey.(n)

programme.title: She's Making a List
programme.desc: A Christmas inspector whose job it is to decide whether children have been naughty or nice fall for the widowed father of the girl she's supposed to evaluate. Before she knows it, her job - and her heart - are on the line. Romantic comedy, starring Lacey Chabert and Alessandro Miro.(n)

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: Kung fu prodigy Li Fong moves to New York City with his mother and befriends his classmate, Mia. But Connor Day, a local karate champion, provokes Li and publicly humiliates him. Li seeks guidance from his mentor, the kung fu master Mr Han, who reaches out to Daniel LaRusso, convincing the original Karate Kid to teach Li the principles of Miyagi Karate. Drama sequel, starring Jackie Chan, Ben Wang and Ralph Macchio.(n)

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Green's thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis.(n)

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: Two rivals fight for control of a major crime family. Director Barry Levinson's drama based on true events, starring Robert De Niro, Cosmo Jarvis and Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mother's first date in years takes a chilling turn when she's bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landon's thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar.(n)

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: Washed-up Hollywood action hero Bradley Mack takes a role in a small English village's quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the show's straight-talking dance instructor. Festive family comedy, starring Kiefer Sutherland, Rebel Wilson, Alice Eve and Danny Dyer.(n)

programme.title: She's Making a List

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mother's decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Comedy drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin.(n)

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Green's thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis.(n)

Before she knows it, her job - and her heart - are on the line. Romantic comedy, starring Lacey Chabert and Alessandro Miro.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: Washed-up Hollywood action hero Bradley Mack takes a role in a small English village's quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the show's straight-talking dance instructor. Festive family comedy, starring Kiefer Sutherland, Rebel Wilson, Alice Eve and Danny Dyer.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: A gay man makes a deal with his lesbian friend - a green-card marriage for him, in exchange for in vitro fertilisation treatments for her. Romantic comedy, starring Bowen Yang, Lily Gladstone and Kelly Marie Tran.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: Kung fu prodigy Li Fong moves to New York City with his mother and befriends his classmate, Mia. But Connor Day, a local karate champion, provokes Li and publicly humiliates him. Li seeks guidance from his mentor, the kung fu master Mr Han, who reaches out to Daniel LaRusso, convincing the original Karate Kid to teach Li the principles of Miyagi Karate. Drama sequel, starring Jackie Chan, Ben Wang and Ralph Macchio.

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mother's first date in years takes a chilling turn when she's bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landon's thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar.

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: A year after their friend disappeared, a group find themselves trapped in a time loop, where they are hunted and killed unless they survive until dawn. Video game-inspired horror, starring Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino and Odessa A'zion.

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: Two rivals fight for control of a major crime family. Director Barry Levinson's drama based on true events, starring Robert De Niro, Cosmo Jarvis and Debra Messing.

programme.desc: A gay man makes a deal with his lesbian friend - a green-card marriage for him, in exchange for in vitro fertilisation treatments for her. Romantic comedy, starring Bowen Yang, Lily Gladstone and Kelly Marie Tran.

programme.title: Call to Earth
programme.desc: Our waterways often bear the brunt of modern-day human negligence. Most of India's ponds, lakes and oceans are polluted or contaminated due to human activity. programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: A tormented father makes vengeance his life's mission after his son is caught in a gang's crossfire and dies on Christmas Eve. Sky Original from the producer of John Wick.

programme.desc: Businessman James Stewart is on the brink of suicide when an angel gives him a glimpse of what the world would've been like without him.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: An ex-soldier meets a teen fleeing a gang, an encounter which forces them to confront their pasts while navigating present realities. Director Mark O'Connor's thriller, starring Luke McQuillan, Aidan Gillen and Daniel Fee.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer in a snowbound wilderness, they follow him into a deadly land known as the Thicket. Director Elliott Lester's drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Juliette Lewis, Gbenga Akinnagbe and Levon Hawke.

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga - Chapter 1
programme.desc: Families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas during the 19th century. Meanwhile, a seasoned cowboy goes on the run with a prostitute and a young lad after killing a fellow gunman. Western, starring Kevin Costner, who also co-wrote and directed, with Sienna Miller and Sam Worthington.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: An ex-soldier meets a teen fleeing a gang, an encounter which forces them to confront their pasts while navigating present realities. Director Mark O'Connor's thriller, starring Luke McQuillan, Aidan Gillen and Daniel Fee.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Environmental activists hijack an energy company's gala in Canary Wharf and take 300 hostages and an ex-soldier now working as a window cleaner tries to rescue them. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley and Clive Owen.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious unchartered island in the Pacific, a team of scientists embark on a top-secret mission to the same region. Things soon descend into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming, and they must battle to escape from the domain of the mighty Kong. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. programme.desc: Cash is attempting to live an honest and quiet life, but when Big Cat forces him back into her services, he proves capable of anything to protect the town and the only family he has left. Thriller, starring Orlando Bloom and Andie MacDowell.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: As part of a patrol tasked with clearing stray dogs before the 2008 Olympics, former stunt motorcyclist Lang bonds with a hound. Drama, starring Eddie Peng and Tong Liya. In Chinese with English subtitles.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A preacher's past is revived during a war between two Maori tribes. Co-writer/director Lee Tamahori's action drama, starring Guy Pearce and Tioreore Ngatai-Melbourne.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride Or Die
programme.desc: Fugitives from the law they swore to protect, Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett run a gauntlet of duplicitous police officers and gun-toting criminals in an attempt to clear their late captain's name. Fourth chapter in the action adventure franchise, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens and Ioan Gruffudd.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Meteorologist Kate Cooper crosses paths with social media star Tyler Owens. He recklessly chases storms with his crew and gleefully posts their daredevil exploits, as multiple storm systems converge over central Oklahoma. Standalone disaster sequel, starring Daisy Edgar-Jones and Glen Powell.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.

House of 1000 Corpses is at its core a story of family - a cast of twisted individuals who, with each slash of a throat or stab thru the chest, add bodies to their sick human menagerie.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: Three brilliant African American women at NASA, Katherine Johnson, Dorothy Vaughan and Mary Jackson, serve as the brains behind one of the greatest operations in history, the launch of astronaut John Glenn into orbit, a stunning achievement that restored the nation's confidence, turned around the Space Race and galvanized the world.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.desc: After a quick courtship, two lovers decide to tie the knot. As their first year of marriage unfolds, temptation and incompatibility put their relationship in jeopardy.

programme.desc: Everyone in the Portokalos family worries about Toula (Nia Vardalos). programme.title: Architecton
programme.desc: A hypnotic, propulsive odyssey through the foundations of the modern world, following mountains as they are turned into concrete and buildings as they are turned into rubble.

programme.title: On Becoming a Guinea Fowl
programme.desc: On an empty road in the middle of the night, Shula stumbles across the body of her uncle. As the funeral unfolds, the cousins unveil the buried secrets of their Zambian family in a vibrant reckoning with the lies we tell ourselves.

programme.title: Whitney Houston: I Wanna Dance With Somebody
programme.desc: Discovered by record executive Clive Davis, Whitney Houston rises to fame in the 1980s to become one of the greatest singers of her generation.

programme.title: Emmanuelle
programme.desc: In search of a lost pleasure, Emmanuelle flies alone to Hong Kong and meets a man who constantly eludes her.

programme.title: Martha Marcy May Marlene
programme.desc: After several years of living with a cult, Martha (Elizabeth Olsen) finally escapes and calls her estranged sister, Lucy (Sarah Paulson), for help. Martha finds herself at the quiet Connecticut home Lucy shares with her new husband, Ted (Hugh Dancy), but the memories of what she experienced in the cult make peace hard to find. As flashbacks continue to torment her, Martha fails to shake a terrible

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: Alex Browning (Devon Sawa), is embarking on a trip to Paris. Alex experiences a premonition -- he sees the plane explode moments after leaving the ground. Alex insists that everyone get off the plane and 7 people including Alex, are forced to disembark. All watch as the plane actually explodes in a fireball. He and the other survivors have briefly cheated death, but will not be able to evade their

programme.title: Final Destination 2
programme.desc: Kimberly (A.J. Cook) has a premonition of a horrible highway accident killing multiple people -- including her and her friends. She blocks the cars behind her on the ramp from joining traffic -- and as a police trooper (Michael Landes) arrives, the accident actually happens. Now, Death is stalking this group of mistaken survivors -- and one by one they are dying as they were supposed to on the hig

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: Six years after a group of high-school students first cheated death, another teen (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) has a premonition that she and her friends will be involved in a horrifying roller-coaster accident. When the vision proves true, the student and her fellow survivors must deal with the repercussions of cheating the Grim Reaper.

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: While enjoying a day at the track, Nick O'Bannon (Bobby Campo) has a horrific premonition of his friends and him all dying in a freak accident involving many racecars. Mere seconds before the vision comes true, he manages to convince them to leave. Although they cheat death then, the survivors each begin to meet a grisly end, and Nick tries to figure a way to escape a similar fate.

programme.title: Final Destination 5
programme.desc: During a bus ride with his colleagues to a corporate retreat, Sam (Nicholas D'Agosto) experiences a horrifying vision: the suspension bridge that they -- and many others -- are crossing starts to crumble around them. programme.title: Final Destination Bloodlines
programme.desc: Plagued by a violent and recurring nightmare, a college student heads home to track down the one person who might be able to break the cycle of death and save her family from the grisly demise that inevitably awaits them all.

programme.title: The Brothers McMullen
programme.desc: When you're a good Irish Catholic, you choose one person to be with for the rest of your life. But how can you be sure you've found "the one"? Each of the three brothers McMullen turns up a different answer to that question in this warm-hearted romantic comedy about the reality of true love and familial bonds. "The Brothers McMullen" is not about flash or style; it's about the basic connections pe

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: In the 1800s, a group of all-female warriors protects the African kingdom of Dahomey with skills and fierceness unlike anything the world has ever seen. Faced with a new threat, Gen. Nanisca trains the next generation of recruits to fight against a foreign enemy that's determined to destroy their way of life.

programme.title: Sing Sing
programme.desc: A man is imprisoned at Sing Sing for a crime he didn't commit. When joined by a wary outsider, he finds purpose in staging an original comedy with a theater group of other incarcerated men.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: When a lively young family moves in next door, grumpy widower Otto Anderson meets his match in a quick-witted, pregnant woman named Marisol, leading to an unlikely friendship that turns his world upside down.

programme.title: Sinners
programme.desc: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their Mississippi hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.

programme.title: Shame
programme.desc: Successful and handsome New Yorker Brandon (Michael Fassbender) seems to live an ordinary life, but he hides a terrible secret behind his mask of normalcy: Brandon is a sex addict. His constant need for gratification numbs him to just about everything else. But, when Sissy (Carey Mulligan), Brandon's needy sister, unexpectedly blows into town, crashes at his apartment and invades his privacy, Bran

programme.title: All Eyez on Me
programme.desc: The true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur (Demetrius Shipp Jr.), from his early days in New York to his status as one of the world's most recognized and influential voices. Against all odds, Shakur's raw talent, powerful lyrics and revolutionary mindset establish him as a cultural icon whose legacy continues to grow long after his death.

programme.title: Heretic
programme.desc: A diabolical Mr. Reed ensnares two young missionaries in a terrifying game of cat and mouse when they knock on the wrong door and are forced to prove their faith.

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novitiate on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the order's unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: An evil spreads in 1956 France as a priest is murdered and Sister Irene once again comes face-to-face with the demonic nun Valak.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Former toy maker Sam Mullins and his wife, Esther, are happy to welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their California farmhouse. Years earlier, the couple's 7-year-old daughter Annabelle died in a tragic car accident. Terror soon strikes when one child sneaks into a forbidden room and finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: Annabelle Comes Home
programme.desc: Determined to keep Annabelle from wreaking more havoc, paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren lock the possessed doll in the artifacts room in their house. But when the doll awakens the room's evil spirits, it soon becomes an unholy night of terror for the couple's 10-year-old daughter, her friends and their young baby sitter.

programme.title: The Legend of Ochi
